Name: Trakteren
Review Text: We bought speciality coffee beans here a couple of times and they were the best!! We tried the same type of beans in other cafes in Amsterdam but it's not the same quality. Trakteren has the best in Amsterdam. We bought their Geisha coffee beans (which is very hard to gind) and the coffee made from these beans is fabulous.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Best place for specialty coffee in Amsterdam. Experts in aeropress, espresso & latte art. No nonsense and lots of knowledge what they (the 2 very personal owners Erik & Edward) love to share with you or teach you. Big variety in Single Origen chocolate (also vegan!) and (matcha) tea. Even good decaf and vegan milk!! üíö

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: For sure one of the best coffee places in Amsterdam. No fancy stuff, but just the kind of coffee you're looking for! Quality is always good, and the guys are always relaxed

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Just had a double espresso , this place hidden gem ! The guys are both dutch aeropress champs ! Friendly service delicious coffe !

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: A true coffee lovers place! Very friendly staff, lots of (delicious) vegan cake and every kind of coffee method can be found here. The interior looks a bit messy/chaotic though... could be a bit more space efficient. But would definitely go back for a coffee & cake here!

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: I don't drink coffee but their collection of tea is great. My favorite is the Red Pink tea. I hear their varieties of coffee are really good, as well. Top it all off with very knowledgeable and friendly service and you have a definite 5-star review in my book.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Great place to get your coffee, tea and other supplies. Attentive staff with a lot of expertise. The place to get your caffeine fix (and wine talk with Ed ;-))

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Amazing coffee, and the owner gived us a very good welcom attitude

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Great coffee,  great suggestion for the beans from the staff.  Loved it!

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Excellent coffee, chilled out vibe, lots of equipment and chocolate for sale, friendly staff and customers. A delight to have this place so close to my apartment.

Name: Trakteren

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Thank you for keeping it up all those years guys! Truly appreciated

Name: Trakteren
Review Text:
It's my favourite coffee place.
Bear in mind, they are in a corridor shaped place, a bit dark,  And the terrace is very tiny. Not ideal for a warm sunny day. Any other day is perfect thought. They are really nice and make good coffee.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Lovely local place with owners, who is always there. The coffee is top, also hot chocolate for my kids. Try their gluten free cookie and sugar-free candies! Also, great selection of chocolates on the retail.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Excellent coffee, cosy place, welcoming owners. I can't manage without regular visits :)

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: This used to be my favorite cafe in Amsterdam, however I am done supporting it, as they are shamefully disregarding the current corona rules and either wear their masks just over their mouths or no masks at all. Disgusting, really.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: The coffee is great and you can just tell you're stepping into a place where taste is important and the baristas know what they're doing. However, the place itself is just the opposite of cozy. If only the atmosphere of the cafe was warmer.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: It's great to find a shakerato in Amsterdam. My favourite ice coffee (just espresso, ice and syrup). Nice local haunt, great cakes and pleasant atmosphere.

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Small and cozy place. Coffee is excellent.

Review Text: Great experience, great staff and excellent coffee. I came in for a cappuccino and left with coffee in my belly and a sustainable chocolate bar supporting Gorilla conservation in Virunga, Congo (think Dian Fossey, Gorillas in the Mist)!

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: Nice coffee, absolutely awful service. Not sure if it was because I'm was a tourist and it's a 'local' coffee shop for 'local people', but I literally have never felt so unwelcome. So disappointing :(

Name: Trakteren
Review Text: A very special place for those who can appreciate good coffee. Nice desserts and passionate coffee lovers who work here make the atmosphere. Cosy, wonderful.

Name: Trakteren

Name: Trakteren
